author: Draper
description:
A Cog which uses the Spotify API through Trusty's Spotify Cog <https://github.com/TrustyJAID/Trusty-cogs> to search for tracks, playlists and Albums from Spotify to play.
Help translate the project to your language by contributing to <https://crowdin.com/project/pylavshared> and <https://crowdin.com/project/mediaplayer>; Translations will be made available as an update shortly after they are translated on Crowdin.
end_user_data_statement: This cog will store user info needed for its functions - for example user IDs to remember user specific settings.
install_msg:
Make sure to have read the setup instruction for <https://github.com/Drapersniper/PyLav> (<https://github.com/Drapersniper/PyLav/blob/master/SETUP.md>) to ensure you have set it up correctly before loading any cogs.
Help translate the project to your language by contributing to <https://crowdin.com/project/pylavshared> and <https://crowdin.com/project/mediaplayer>; Translations will be made available as an update shortly after they are translated on Crowdin.
name: PyLavSpotify
short: A Cog which uses the Spotify API through Trusty's Spotify Cog <https://github.com/TrustyJAID/Trusty-cogs> to search for tracks, playlists and Albums from Spotify to play.
